column1: You notice that Adwords revenue for a certain word has dropped in Italy for the last 30 days. How would you diagnose what happened?
How will you position the current legacy product considering that the next generation product is beginning to be offered?
Can you tell me how you would manage a new product launch?
What is the marginal cost of a gigabyte in Gmail?
Why is a good user interface good for the company?
How would you design Google Maps for children?
How many hotels are there in the United States?
Design an elevator for a building in San Francisco.
How would you make Web browsing faster in developing countries?
How would you implement a solar panels project to put solar panels our New York buildings?
If you were going to plan two new distribution center locations for Amazon where would you locate them and why?
How do you think Amazon may have come up with the $80 fee for the Amazon Prime membership program?
What do you think Facebook should do next?
Estimate the annual gasoline expenses for Pizza Hut in San Francisco.
Why are you the best candidate.
What emerging technologies are you tracking?
What Google product do you like the best and how would you improve it?
Tell me how you would reorganize the Yahoo homepage.
Why do you want to work here?
How would you make Google Calendar better?
Let's say we are sitting in a Starbucks in San Francisco and we notice there is another one across the street. How would we figure out how many Starbucks there are in the country?
Why does Starbucks expand the way they do having multiple stores next to each other?
How would you prioritize resources when you have two important projects but can't do them both?
What product in the market place do you think is well marketed and positioned?
How do you measure success of the Cloud Drive product of Amazon?
How would you design a bike GPS unit?
How would you build a Search product for restaurants?
What would you do if you were the CEO of Apple?
What is the average monthly revenue of an indie movie theater in San Francisco?
Spotify needs to have listeners listen to new music. Devise a product plan.
How would you market this pen?
What is your favorite website? How would you improve it.
How have you stayed ahead of the market in regards to monitoring the competition and market trends?
How much revenue does Youtube make in a day?
What metrics do you have to consider to rank the sellers of a product in an online shopping website?
You're given the lead position on a new store that needs to launch in 90 days. What do you do?
What are you passionate about outside work? How could you completely disrupt that industry?
How many Piano Tuners operate a business in New York City?
If you had a magic wand to change the main page of Yahoo! what would you change? Why?
Design a better toothpaste tube.
How would you improve Google Search?
What will you bring to the company?
Estimate how much disk space Google needed when launching Gmail in 2004?
What are your weaknesses?
How many gallons of paint would it take to paint every building in Chicago?
How many french fries does McDonalds produce in a day.
What are the two most important attributes of a successful Product Manager?
Design the user experience for social in Expedia's travel offerings.
Sales are declining at JD Toys Inc. Why?
Tell me about a time when you made a bad decision. What did you do?
What's the biggest challenge you faced in a previous job and how did you deal with it?
Tell me about a time a project went wrong and what you could have done in hindsight to fix it.
What can Microsoft do to better compete with Apple in the mobile device space?
How much money spent in USA per year on gas?
Phils is currently selling coffee through their own cafes. They are considering selling in supermarkets. Should they? Why or why not? What will happen and why?
Design the ideal kitchen for a retirement community.
How would you build a computer for a parapleigic?
How many car batteries are sold in the U.S. every year?
You own a burrito shop and you want to advertise in a fleet of 100 cabs in San Francisco. The ad will be seen only by the passenger(s). How much are you willing to pay per month.
Our engineers just invented the teletransporter. Give me your go-to-market plan.
Can you describe your greatest succes?
Tell me about a time when you disagreed with what your manager was directing you to do.
How should Google design and market an Android phone in Nigeria?
What is the purpose of the Facebook news feed? How would you improve it?
Can you tell me how you would manage a product launch for Samsungâ€™s newest smart TV?
What is the marginal cost of a gigabyte in Gmail?
What projects have you worked on that would help you with your responsibilities here?
How would you design a web app for apartment hunting in Boston?
How would you improve a dry erase marker?
Tell us about a time you failed to meet a deadline or failed.
Why did you leave your previous company?
What is your favorite app? Why?
Tell me about a time you had to influence someone without authority.
Describe your favorite product. How would you improve it?
Why do you want to work here?
Describe a time when you launched a new product.
Describe a mistake you made and how you fixed it.
How would you reduce bandwidth consumption in Google Search when users from third 3rd world countries use it?
Tell me about a time you solved a problem with data.
